about_the_game:
In Study of Unusual: Forest of Secrets you are secret agent which went to unusual forest. You need to find out the reason of people disappearing. During the investigation you need to unravel the mystery of the forest, collecting notes and documents of disappeared people and try to stay alive.

Passing Principle

Collect notes in the forest to understand what happened to the missing people here.
The game has 7 notes.

Tips

Use saves as often as possible, because the Monster can kill you

Game Features

- Open world
- seamless locations
- Horror atmosphere
detailed_description:
In Study of Unusual: Forest of Secrets you are secret agent which went to unusual forest. You need to find out the reason of people disappearing. During the investigation you need to unravel the mystery of the forest, collecting notes and documents of disappeared people and try to stay alive.

Passing Principle

Collect notes in the forest to understand what happened to the missing people here.
The game has 7 notes.

Tips

Use saves as often as possible, because the Monster can kill you

Game Features

- Open world
- seamless locations
- Horror atmosphere

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: intel core i3-2400 CPU 2.40GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GT 640
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: i5-4170 3.70 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

bbfc.descriptors: In Study of Unusual: Forest of Secrets you are secret agent which went to unusual forest. You need to find out the reason of people disappearing. During the investigation you need to unravel the mystery of the forest, collecting notes and documents of disappeared people and try to stay alive.

During the investigation you need to unravel the mystery of the forest, collecting notes and documents of disappeared people and try to stay alive.

crl.descriptors: В игре Study of Unusual: Forest of Secrets вы являетесь агентом секретной организации, которая отправила вас на миссию в необычный лес, чтобы выяснить из-за чего в нем пропадают люди. В ходе выполнения задания вы должны разгадать тайну леса, собирая различные записки и документы пропавших, а так же постараться остаться в живых.
